World History Quiz;What scandal forced U.S. President Richard Nixon to resign in 1974?;Watergate;Iran Contra;Lewinsky Scandal;Whitewater
World History Quiz;The Cuban Revolution led to the rise of what dictator?;Fidel Castro;Che Guevara;Rafael Trujillo;Augusto Pinochet
World History Quiz;Along with Hiroshima, Japan, which Japanese city was hit by an atomic bomb in 1945?;Nagasaki;Tokyo;Osaka;Nagoya
World History Quiz;Who was the first female prime minister of Britain?;Margaret Thatcher;Florence Nightingale;Queen Elizabeth II;Jane Austen
World History Quiz;Who assassinated Abraham Lincoln?;John Wilkes Booth;Lee Harvey Oswald;James Earl Ray;Leon Czolgosz
World History Quiz;Adolf Hitler was the leader of which party?;Nazi Party;Communist Party;Republican Fascist Party;none of the above.
World History Quiz;Which continent was devastated by the Black Death in the 1300s?;Europe;North America;South America;Africa
World History Quiz;What charter was passed by King John of England in 1215?;Magna Carta;Mayflower Compact;Stamp Act;Quartering Act
World History Quiz;What acquisition of territory by the United States from France happened in 1803?;Louisiana Purchase;Alaskan Purchase;the annexation of Texas;none of the above
World History Quiz;Along with the United States, what other world power was a major player in the War of 1812?;Great Britain;Mexico;Japan;Italy
